import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import '../Menu.css' const Search = () => { const [searchText, setSearchText] = useState(''); const handleSearch = () => { const searchQuery = encodeURIComponent(searchText); const googleSearchUrl = `https://www.google.com/search?q=${searchQuery}`; window.location.href = googleSearchUrl; }; const handleInputChange = (event) => { setSearchText(event.target.value); }; return (
  • Homepage
  • Gallery
  • Contact
{showDropdown && (
  • Home

  • Contacts Us
)}
) } export default Search
